answers.answer: It would be good for members if you would enlarge further  I expect most do realise , but could you add why there would be a risk Factor and any other information,... thanks
my mom has Diabetis and has alz but her mom didnt have Diabetis and she had it .

My Mom also fell into that catagory she had diabetes and in her last few years had some dementia , but she was unhappy , I think if her life had been more fulfilling and she had had family around it would have been better.

question: THERE IS A HIGH RISK FACTOR OF GETTING ALZHEIMERS IF YOU HAVE DIABETIS. ALSO, DOWN SYNDROME ALSO IS ANOTHER RISK FACTOR.
title: HIGH INCIDENT WITH DIABETIS AND ALZHEIMER'S
